author: smilek
msg: added jetspeed.widget.ie6ZappedContentHelper node for use in nudging portlet windows after dragging in IE6 to address content disappearance (portlets with input/select tags tend to have this problem in IE6); adjusted dragging code to remove cosmetic glitches in firefox having to do with initial mouse event reporting location relative to static node that is being dragged

author: smilek
msg: added jetspeed.widget.IE6ZappedContentRestorer type for adding the jetspeed.widget.ie6ZappedContentHelper node to each column after returing from move-mode in IE6; added calls to jetspeed.page.displayAllPortlets() when transitioning to/from edit-mode
